Bru-no Santos Experimental Digital Designer

About me

Hey! Welcome to my website / portfolio / online place where I put my stuff that I'm never satisfied with.

I’m a Digital Experience Designer from Lisbon who loves to explore, experiment and have fun with the web. Feel free to explore around or just talk to me!

Come back during the day for the more polished version of me.

What's going on?

Well, I'm a night owl kind of guy and if you're seeing this, it probably means that I'm experimenting or working on something at the moment.


Every night you'll be able to drop by and see the latest dumb thing I'm coming up with. I'll try to make something new every week

Unfortunately Nothing available this week :(

I gotta finish the entire website first.

Let me know if this sparked any ideas for me to try out.

hello@bru-no.com
